Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.controller

Class MultiplayerGameServer

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.controller.MultiplayerGameServer
public class MultiplayerGameServer
extends java.lang.Object
mulitplaer game class prepared for online game Controller of game Computed, stores and directs all game actions

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void keyMovementListener()
    Method that controls players movings listeners for player action player can move, put bombs there is tested if player press or released a key
    void moveEnemy()
    method that passes through enemies and change their position by their move mehcanics method controll free directions and choose free ways
    void removeEnemyfromList​(java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies)
    method that remove death enemies
    void startGame()
    Method that set map and enemies start frame timer every frame controll collisions, movings, putting bombs and deaths send every 20th frame to client check if player pause game
    void stopGameForLose()
    method that end game after loose
    void stopGameWin()
    method that end game for win
